Select idCadastro,
       sCodigoCadastro    as CODIGO,
       sTipoFje           as PESSOA,
       sCnpjCpfPassaporte as CNPJ_CPF_PASSAPORTE,
       sIe                as INSCRICAO_ESTADUAL,
       sim                as INSCRICAO_MUNICIPAL,
       sRazao             AS RAZAO,
       sFantasia          as FANTASIA,
       sRg                AS RG,
       sEstadocivil       AS ESTADO_CIVIL,
       sNaturalidade      AS NATURALIDADE,
       sNacionalidade     as NACIONALIDADE,
       sSexo              AS SEXO,
       dDatacadastro      AS DATA_CADASTRO,
       sUF                AS UF,
       sCep               AS CEP,
       scidade            AS CIDADE,
       sMunicipio         AS MUNICIPIO,
       idMunicipio        AS CODIGO_MUNICIPIO,
       sStatus            AS STATUS_CADASTRO,
       sEndereco          AS ENDERECO,
       sNumero            AS NUMERO,
       sComplemento       AS COMPLEMENTO,
       dDatanascimento    AS DATA_NASCIMENTO,
       sFoneResidencial   AS TELEFONE_RESIDENCIAL,
       sFoneComercial     AS TELEFONE_COMERCIAL,
       sFoneContato       AS TELEFONE_CONTATO,
       sBairro            AS BAIRRO,
       dDataempresa       AS DATA_EMPRESA,
       flCaptal           as CAPTAL,
       sCelular           as TELEFONE_CELULAR,
       sFax               AS FAX,
       sContato           AS NOME_CONTATO,
       sProcurador        AS PROCURADOR,
       sWhatsapp          AS WHATSAPP,
       sEmail             AS EMAIL,
       sLinkedin          AS LINKEDIN,
       sSite              AS SITE,
       sFacebook          AS FACEBOOK,
       sTwitter           AS TWITTER,
       sInstagram         AS INSTAGRAM,
       sYoutube           AS YOUTUBE,
       sSnapchat          AS SNAPCHAT,
       sProfissao         as PROFISSAO,
       flLimitecred       AS LIMITE_CREDITO,
       flSaldodecredito   AS SALDO_CREDITO,
       sIndicadopor       AS INDICADO,
       idCondicoespg1     AS CONDICAO1,
       idCondicoespg2     AS CONDICAO2,
       idCondicoespg3     AS CONDICAO3,
       idCondicoespg4     AS CONDICAO4,
       idCondicoespg5     AS CONDICAO5,
       idCondicoespg6     AS CONDICAO6,
       idCondicoespg7     AS CONDICAO7,
       idCondicoespg8     AS CONDICAO8,
       idCondicoespg9     AS CONDICAO9,
       idCondicoespg10    AS CONDICAO10,
       sObs               AS OBS,
       sFoto,
       idPais,
       idTipoCadastro,
       idSubTipoCadastro,
       idVendedor,
       idRepresentate,
       idTransporte,
       C.idEndereco as idEndereco
       from tbCadastros C
LEFT JOIN tbendereco E ON C.idEndereco = E.idEndereco
